About us

Hello and welcome

My name is Lukas and on this website, I present my approaches to a playful and acrobatic movement practice. While I am into teaching classes, workshops, and preparing online programs, Franz is helping with research, development, and tech support.

To learn more about my approach, my practice and the team you can use the link below.

Read more

Classes and privates

Ready to experience the world differently? Move with us!

  • Regular classes

    From 13 €
    Highlights
    • Movement and softacro
    • Rings and handstand

    Regular classes and privates are perfect to start or deepen your movement practice and be motivated by the great support of the community.

    info and booking
  • events

    Workshops

    From 80 €
    Highlights
    • Indoor and outdoor
    • Different locations

    Dive into one of my favorite topics in a half-day, day, or weekend event. The topics reach from Ringstrength & Handstand to more abstract concepts like Softacrobatics.

    info and booking
  • events

    Retreats

    Highlights
    • Exiting locations
    • Unique programs

    Full body immersion into a mix of guided movement sessions & free time with a fun community.

    info and booking

Online coaching and programs

Have a look at different online programs to be able to learn from everywhere. Sending in videos to get online feedback is also possible.

move online
I believe in the ability of each and every person to build awareness for their bodies and discover their personal way to move and thrive physically and mentally.

What do the students say about my training approach?

The participants of my regular classes and other events can best say why they feel in good hands with my way of training.

Tommes
Martial artist

“Lukas explains precise and takes time for individual and friendly feedback during workshops.”

Anni
Marketing manager

“Highly recommend to join his workshops. I joined the handstand workshop and loved every second of it!”

Lena
Software developer

“I love the focused but playful atmosphere in the workshops and classes.”

Wim
Handstandlover

“Improvement guaranteed! He taught me a lot in my movement journey.”

Helena
Medicine student

“Worth it! Smart content, good vibes, and great people. Always in a good mood afterwards!”

Timo
Cinematograph

“Such individual & precise cues. Progress even in the first session. Really helpful for my understanding.”

Naëmi
Filmdirector

“Wonderful. The workshops Are my regular 'time out' were I can play and explore all kinds of movement.”

Konsti
Pilot

“So thankful!! My shoulders where f****d from too much climbing. Slowy regained control!”

Cordula
Yogateacher

“Wow! best handstand workshop I have ever been to!”

Marius
Traceur

“I have noticeable progress every single session! And it’s super fun with the friendly, supporting community!”
